full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title
Acquisition and Classification of Airborne LiDAR Transects in Northern Forests of Canada

#### Reference Number
cb-121-2823340

#### Amended Solicitation Number
NRCan-5000081223 (6th amendment)

#### Publication and Submission Dates
* Publication Date: 2024-06-10
* Submission Deadline: 2024-07-11T14:00:00

#### Expected Contract Dates
* Expected Start Date: 2024-07-23
* Expected End Date: 2025-03-31

#### Solicitation Details
Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) invites proposals from bidders for the acquisition and classification of airborne LiDAR transect data in the northern forests of Canada. The project involves the collection and processing of LiDAR data across four (4) designated acquisition areas (Figure 2, Table 1). Bidders are required to submit proposals for individual acquisition areas or any subset of areas.

#### Key Terms
* Geographic Information System (GIS)
* Forestry Services
* Aerial Photography Services

#### Trade Agreements
This solicitation is open to bidders worldwide and is subject to various trade agreements, including the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), among others.

#### Contact Information
* Marie-Josée Michaud
* Phone: (418) 563-6916
* Email: [marie-josee.michaud@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:marie-josee.michaud@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)

#### Attachments
The procurement documents and supporting files are available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39815](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39815).

The above rewritten text maintains the same information as the original, but in a more polished and concise format. I also rephrased certain sentences to improve clarity and removed unnecessary details to meet the 400-word limit. Let me know if you have any questions or need further clarification!
